> The missiles dig into WarMachine's chest, leaving smoking dents. The
> gestalt stumbles forward, but regainst balance.
>
> Making his way back toward Minion, he fires at Surge and Shokaract,
> missiles and lasser shots streaming out at them.

Shokaract: He waits for the shots to almost hit, then barely rolls to the
side. He fires back with his gattling gun, 3 missiles at WarMachine.

Serge: Serge was looking at Najah, so BAM! Serge gasps and then turns
without a word, looking at WarMachine. Serge, who was bigger than Shokaract
by 5 feet of so, fires 2 missiles, one from each cannon, at WarMachine...
